#!/bin/bash
# Python Selenium Chrome Installation Script

apt update
apt install -y git curl wget ca-certificates

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

echo "=========================================="
echo "Python Selenium Chrome Environment Setup"
echo "=========================================="

# Check if user wants to clone a repository
if [ ! -z "${INSTALL_REPO}" ]; then
    echo "Cloning repository: ${INSTALL_REPO}"
    
    if [ -z "${INSTALL_BRANCH}" ]; then
        INSTALL_BRANCH="main"
    fi
    
    # Try to clone the repository
    if git clone -b ${INSTALL_BRANCH} https://github.com/${INSTALL_REPO}.git /tmp/repo; then
        echo "Repository cloned successfully!"
        cp -r /tmp/repo/* /mnt/server/
        rm -rf /tmp/repo
    else
        echo "Failed to clone repository. Creating example file..."
        CREATE_EXAMPLE=1
    fi
else
    echo "No repository specified. Creating example file..."
    CREATE_EXAMPLE=1
fi

# Create example file if needed
if [ "${CREATE_EXAMPLE}" == "1" ]; then
    cat > app.py <<'EOF'
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options
from selenium.webdriver.chrome.service import Service
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By
import time
import os

print("ðŸš€ Starting Selenium bot...")

# Get Chrome options from environment
chrome_opts = os.getenv('CHROME_OPTIONS', '--no-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage --headless --disable-gpu')

# Configure Chrome options
chrome_options = Options()
for opt in chrome_opts.split():
    chrome_options.add_argument(opt)

chrome_options.add_argument('--window-size=1920,1080')

print("ðŸ”§ Chrome options configured")

# Initialize driver
try:
    driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=chrome_options)
    print("âœ… Chrome driver initialized successfully")
    
    # Test navigation
    print("ðŸŒ Navigating to example.com...")
    driver.get("https://example.com")
    
    print(f"ðŸ“„ Page title: {driver.title}")
    print(f"ðŸ”— Current URL: {driver.current_url}")
    
    # Get page content
    content = driver.find_element(By.TAG_NAME, "body").text
    print(f"ðŸ“ Page content preview: {content[:200]}...")
    
    print("âœ… Test completed successfully!")
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f"âŒ Error: {e}")
    
finally:
    if 'driver' in locals():
        driver.quit()
        print("ðŸ›‘ Driver closed")

# Keep container running
print("â³ Bot finished. Keeping container alive...")
print("   Press Ctrl+C in console to stop")

while True:
    time.sleep(60)
EOF

    echo "Example app.py created!"
fi

# Create example requirements.txt if it doesn't exist
if [ ! -f requirements.txt ]; then
    cat > requirements.txt <<'EOF'
selenium>=4.15.0
webdriver-manager>=4.0.0
requests>=2.31.0
beautifulsoup4>=4.12.0
EOF
    echo "Example requirements.txt created!"
fi

echo "=========================================="
echo "Installation complete!"
echo "=========================================="
echo "Files in container:"
ls -la /mnt/server/
echo "=========================================="
